F

Fire - Class in game.items
A class that represents a fire in the game map It will be dropped after a successful fire attack action by the actor The fire will stay on the ground for three turns, and it will deal 20 damage per turn.
Fire() - Constructor for class game.items.Fire
Constructor of Fire Class
FIRE_ATTACK - game.Status
use this status to indicate the actor can use fire attack
FIRE_DAMAGE - game.Status
use this status to indicate a particular ground can do fire damage
FireAttackAction - Class in game.actions
An action that allows the actor to attack with fire (i.e., dropping a fire on target's location) It will be available to the user on the console once the Player has the capability of FIRE_ATTACK This capability can be gain by consuming a fire flower
FireAttackAction(Actor, String) - Constructor for class game.actions.FireAttackAction
Constructor of FireAttackAction
FireAttackBehaviour - Class in game.behaviours
A class that figures out a FireAttackAction that will attack the player automatically.
FireAttackBehaviour() - Constructor for class game.behaviours.FireAttackBehaviour
 
FireFlower - Class in game.items.magicalitems
This class is a subclass of MagicalItems, after consuming the fire flower, the actor can use fire attack action to target (i.e., drop a fire on target's location) This "fire attack" effect will last for 20 turns
FireFlower() - Constructor for class game.items.magicalitems.FireFlower
Constructor of FireFlower class
FIRST_MAP - game.Status
use this status to indicate the actor is currently on the first map
FIRST_PRIORITY - Static variable in class game.actors.enemies.Enemy
A constant integer that will be used as a key in the hash map to indicate which behaviour is the first priority
Floor - Class in game.grounds
A class that represents the floor inside a building It extends from Ground class It only can be entered by actors that are not hostile to enemy, enemies are not allowed to enter
Floor() - Constructor for class game.grounds.Floor
Constructor
FlyingKoopa - Class in game.actors.enemies.koopas
FlyingKoopa class is a class represents one kind of GeneralKoopa of this game.
FlyingKoopa() - Constructor for class game.actors.enemies.koopas.FlyingKoopa
Constructor.
FollowBehaviour - Class in game.behaviours
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
FollowBehaviour(Actor) - Constructor for class game.behaviours.FollowBehaviour
Constructor.
Fountain - Class in game.grounds.fountains
This class is an abstract class extended from the Ground class to provide blueprint for fountains such as PowerFountain and HealthFountain classes.
Fountain(char, String) - Constructor for class game.grounds.fountains.Fountain
constructor
FOURTH_PRIORITY - Static variable in class game.actors.enemies.Enemy
A constant integer that will be used as a key in the hash map to indicate which behaviour is the forth priority
